<template>
  <b-container fluid>
    <b-form>
      <b-row class="mt-2">
        <b-col sm="3" offset="2">
          <b-input
            v-model="newModel"
            class="mb-2 mr-sm-2 mb-sm-0"
            placeholder="Enter new model"
          ></b-input>
        </b-col>
        <b-col sm="3">
          <b-input
            v-model="newProducer"
            placeholder="Enter new producer"
          ></b-input>
        </b-col>
        <b-col sm="3">
          <b-input v-model="newPrice" placeholder="Enter new price"></b-input>
        </b-col>
        <b-col sm="1">
          <b-button variant="primary" size="lg" @click="addNew">Save</b-button>
        </b-col>
      </b-row>
    </b-form>
  </b-container>
</template>


<script>
import { mapActions } from "vuex";

export default {
  name: "EditMobile",

  props: {
    model: {
      type: String,
      default: "",
    },
    producer: {
      type: String,
      default: "",
    },
    price: {
      type: Number,
      default: "",
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      newModel: "",
      newProducer: "",
      newPrice: "",
      id: "",
    };
  },
  mounted: function () {
    this.newModel = this.model;
    this.newProducer = this.producer;
    this.newPrice = this.price;
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions(["new_mobile", "change_mobile"]),

    addNew: function () {
      const mob = JSON.stringify({
        model: this.newModel,
        producer: this.newProducer,
        price: parseInt(this.newPrice),
      });

      if (!this.$route.params.id) this.new_mobile(mob);
      else {
        this.change_mobile({ id: this.$route.params.id, mob: mob });
      }
      this.newModel = "";
      this.newProducer = "";
      this.newPrice = "";
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
